links.title: Disclosure under Regulation 46 of SEBI LODR 2015
links.content:
Disclosure under Regulation 46 of Securities and Exchange Board of India
(Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI LODR 2015)
Sr Particulars of items to be hosted on the Weblink
website
1 Business details www.eurekaforbes.com
2 Terms and conditions of appointment of www.eurekaforbes.com/media/pdf/Terms-of-Appointment-of-
Independent Directors Independent-Directors.pdf
3 Composition of various committees of www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-
board of directors relations/Board_of_Directors_and_Committee_May_29_2023.pdf
4 Code of conduct of Board of directors and www.eurekaforbes.com/media/Code_of_Conduct_for_Board_of_D
senior management personnel irectors_Senior_Management_Personnel.pdf
5 Details of establishment of vigil www.eurekaforbes.com/media/pdf/whistle-blower-policy.pdf
mechanism/ Whistle Blower policy
6 Criteria of making payments to Non - www.eurekaforbes.com/media/Code_of_Conduct_for_Non_Execut
Executive Directors. ive_Director.pdf
7 Policy on dealing with related party www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-relations/Policy-on-
transactions Materiality-of-Related-Party-Transactions-and-on-dealing-with-
Related-Party-Transactions.pdf
8 Policy for determining ‘material’ www.eurekaforbes.com/media/pdf/PolicyonMaterialSubsidiary.pdf
subsidiaries
9 Details of familiarization programmes
imparted to independent directors including
the following details
(i) Number of programmes attended by
independent directors (during the year and www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-relations/Familiarisation-
on a cumulative basis till date), Programme-For-Independent-Directors.pdf
(ii) Number of hours spent by independent
directors in such programmes (during the
year and on cumulative basis till date), and
(iii) Other Details
10 The email address for grievance redressal
and other relevant details.
11 Contact information of the designated www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-relations/Contact-
officials of the listed entity who are Information.pdf
responsible for assisting and handling
investor grievances.
12 Financial information including: www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/corporate-
(i) Notice of meeting of the board of announcements/
directors where financial results shall
be discussed;
(ii) Financial results, on conclusion of the www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/financial-
meeting of the board of directors where information/eurekaforbes-ltd/
the financial results were approved;
(iii) A complete copy of the annual report www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/shareholders-
including balance sheet, profit and loss information/annual-general-meeting
account, directors report, corporate
governance report etc
13 Shareholding pattern www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/shareholders-
information/shareholding-pattern/
14 Schedule of analysts or institutional www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/corporate-
investors meet at least two working days in announcements/
advance (excluding the date of the
intimation and the date of the meet) and
presentations made by the listed entity to
analysts or institutional investors.
Sr Particulars of items to be hosted on the Weblink
website
15 Audio or video recordings and transcripts www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/corporate-
of post earnings/quarterly calls, by announcements/
whatever name called, conducted
physically or through digital means.
16 New name and the old name of the listed www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-relations/Contact-
entity for a continuous period of one year, Information.pdf
from the date of the last name change
17 Items in terms of Regulation 47 (1) (The www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/financial-
listed entity shall publish the following information/eurekaforbes-ltd/
information in the newspaper) (financial
results, notices given to shareholders by www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/shareholders-
advertisement) information/
18 Credit Ratings www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/shareholders-
information/credit-rating
19 Separate audited financial statements of www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/financial-
each subsidiary of the listed entity in information/subsidiaries-eurekaforbes-ltd/
respect of a relevant financial year.
20 Secretarial compliance report as per sub- www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/corporate-
regulation (2) of regulation 24A of SEBI announcements/
LODR 2015.
21 Disclosure of the policy for determination
of materiality of events or information
required under Regulation 30 (4) (ii) of
SEBI LODR.
22 Disclosure of contact details of key
managerial personnel who are authorized www.eurekaforbes.com/media/pdf/PolicyforDeterminationofMateri
for the purpose of determining materiality alityfordisclosures.pdf
of an event or information and for the
purpose of making disclosures to stock
exchange(s) as required under sub-
regulation (5) of regulation 30 of SEBI
LODR.
23 Statements of deviation(s) or variation(s) as NA
specified in Regulation 32 of SEBI LODR
24 Dividend distribution policy www.eurekaforbes.com/media/investor-relations/Dividend-
Distribution-Policy.pdf
25 Annual return as provided under section 92 www.eurekaforbes.com/investor-relations/shareholders-
of the Companies Act, 2013. information/annual-general-meeting
